name: Enriched Mithril
description: Condensed mithril, which extracts all the essence, can provide more effective refining value.

name: Enriched Oridecon
description: The mysterious metal known as Enriched Oridecon, harder than anything so it can be used to refine weapons.

name: Entry Plug Backpack
description: It houses the pilot of Evangelion, the Ultimate All-Purpose Humanoid Decisive Battle Weapon.
effect: All Attributes ＋2,10% chance to get Berserk buff when auto attacking: Atk +3%, Def and M.Def -3% for 10s. Stacks up to 5 times.

name: EP 1.0 Card
description: Use it to receive items and activate your own collections

name: Epic Spirit-Lightning
description: The All-Knowing God - For those who have made great contributions. This is one of the hallmarks of Valhalla. Only those who have been granted entrance to Valhalla after death can become a powerful soul.

name: Epic Spirit-Lightning Blueprint
description: The All-Knowing God - For those who have made great contributions. This is one of the hallmarks of Valhalla. Only those who have been granted entrance to Valhalla after death can become a powerful soul.

name: Epic Spirit·Assassin Mist
description: The God of mist, Mist, as the best assassin god, will certainly look after those lurkers in the shadow. The Termination of Mist is the deadly weapon specially made for the assassin in the shadow.

name: Epic Spirit·Death Choice
description: Reward that granted by Orloum in the name of Valhalla to adventurers. The choice of the dead represents the dignity of Valhalla and shows its mission -- to select brave souls for Valhalla.

name: Epic Spirit·Death Choice Blueprint
description: Reward that granted by Orloum in the name of Valhalla to adventurers. The choice of the dead represents the dignity of Valhalla and shows its mission -- to select brave souls for Valhalla.

name: Epic Spirit·Death Choice(change color)
description: Reward that granted by Orloum in the name of Valhalla to adventurers. The choice of the dead represents the dignity of Valhalla and shows its mission -- to select brave souls for Valhalla.

name: Epic Spirit·Death Convoy Blueprint
description: The award for adventurers given by Orloum instead of Valhalla. The path shown by light blue soul flame to guide the dead is where the ghosts will go. Valhalla also welcomes the ones who can see the flame.

name: Epic Spirit·Destructive Lightning
description: The All-Knowing God - For those who have made great contributions. This is one of the hallmarks of Valhalla. Only those who have been granted entrance to Valhalla after death can become a powerful soul.

name: Epic Spirit·Destructive Lightning(change color)
description: The All-Knowing God - For those who have made great contributions. This is one of the hallmarks of Valhalla. Only those who have been granted entrance to Valhalla after death can become a powerful soul.

name: Epic Spirit·Eye of Lightning
description: The All-Knowing God - For those who have made great contributions. This is one of the hallmarks of Valhalla. Only those who have been granted entrance to Valhalla after death can become a powerful soul.

name: Epic Spirit·Eye of Lightning(change color)
description: The All-Knowing God - For those who have made great contributions. This is one of the hallmarks of Valhalla. Only those who have been granted entrance to Valhalla after death can become a powerful soul.

name: Epic Spirit·Gern's Singing
description: The staff owned by the god of magic power, Gern Dahl. It is inlaid with the dense Rune Spell. Use it and the magic power of the user will be upgraded to another level. Only the magic practitioners who have greatly contributed to Valhalla and were appreciated by Gern Dahl can get this reward.
